document_data.name: ''Staff of Displacement''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''staff of displacement''''' was a [[magic]]al staff that, when held by up to three beings, acted as a ''[[cloak of displacement]]'' and offered ''+2 protection'' to the wielders.{{Cite dragon/173/Bazaar of the Bizarre: A wizard's staff is to lean on}}<ref name=RoMD.CG-p110">
document_data.Powers: The staff could also, at-will, allow one of the wielders to leap into the air as per the [[spell]] ''[[jump]]''. Additionally, it allowed the wielder, upon utterance of the [[command word]], to part water in a shape 5' (1.5 m) high and 4' (1.2 m) outward, allowing for underwater breathing. Lastly, it could temporarily negate, although not outright destroy, any ''[[wizard lock]]'' or ''[[hold portal]]'' spell effects.<ref name=RoMD.CG-p110"/>
